Package org.hallebarde.recrutement.api.storage

Interface Options

public interface Options
This interface allows plugins to store their own options in game files, in a key -> value manner. Implementations shall be permissive and perform casts when possible to satisfy the caller's requested type.

  • Method Details

    • getBoolean

      boolean getBoolean(String key) throws NoSuchOptionException, ClassCastException
      Retrieves a boolean value from these options.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to retrieve the value for
      Returns:
      the corresponding value, as a boolean
      Throws:
      NoSuchOptionException - if the requested key does not exist
      ClassCastException - if the requested key exists but cannot be interpreted as a boolean

    • getBoolean

      boolean getBoolean(String key, boolean defaultValue)
      Retrieves a boolean value from these options. If the key is not present in these options, it is inserted along with the default value given by the caller.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to retrieve the value for
      defaultValue - a default value to insert and return if the key is not present in these options.
      Returns:
      the value associated to the given key in these options, or the default value if not present

    • getInteger

      int getInteger(String key) throws NoSuchOptionException, ClassCastException

      Returns:

    • getExistingCategory

      Options getExistingCategory(String key) throws NoSuchOptionException, ClassCastException
      Retrieves a sub category from these options.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to retrieve the sub category for
      Returns:
      the corresponding sub category as another Options
      Throws:
      NoSuchOptionException - if the requested key does not exist
      ClassCastException - if the requested key exists but isn't a sub category

    • getCategory

      Options getCategory(String key)
      Retrieves a sub category from these options. If the key is not present in these options, a new sub category is created.
      Parameters:
      key - the key to retrieve the value for
      Returns:
      the sub category associated to the given key in these options, creating it if not present
